entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to rain or periods of drizzle in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
